subject: Warranty for Order #SSN2564
description_text:
Hello,
I purchased a set of pedals from you in September of this year. Everything
was fine until yesterday. The gas pedal hydraulic dampener stopped working.
Before it was a smooth pedal feel and now it's rough and has no real
resistance. If possible could you ship me out another gas pedal hydraulic
dampener to replace my current one. Thank you!

conversations.body_text: Hi Robert Ocampo,  You can remove the one-way hydraulic damper from the throttle pedal, clean any dust particles on the metal rod, and apply some lubrication. When testing manually, there should be damping when pressing down, and no damping when pulling back. If the problem persists, we can send you a new one as a replacement.

Hello,
I tried relubricating the dampener but it is not working as it once did. If
possible could you send me a replacement dampener. I plan on purchasing 2
VAM pro pedal haptics. Would it be possible for you to just put the extra
gas dampener with that order? I will wait to buy the VAM pro until I hear
back from you.

Thanks for your help.

-Robert

On Mon, Dec 22, 2025, 8:10 AM service@simsonn.com
Hi Robert Ocampo,  We can send you a replacement one-way hydraulic rod. You can also specify this in the order notes.
